channel.title: Question with npc drops in testscape
channel.description: how do you figure out the npcid so that you can make it drop?? it doesnt show up in the listener, and i cant figure out how to find it plzplzplz help.

item.title: Question with npc drops in testscape
item.dc:creator: @pacman89012 pacman89012
item.description:
@pacman89012 wrote:

go into npc drops then type the item id under his drops

Read full topic

item.title: Question with npc drops in testscape
item.dc:creator: @sergio sergio
item.description:
@sergio wrote:

you must go to client.java and click on search and replace
search for admin and replace with your player name

don’t click replace all!! Go replacing 1 by 1 to have sure you don’t replace bad thing lol

Read full topic
